meanings.sent1: She always offers heps to those in need.
meanings.sent2: The community heps each other during difficult times.
meanings.sent3: The heps from the volunteers made the event run smoothly.
meanings.sent4: Her heps were like a guiding light in the darkness of despair.
meanings.sent5: The heps provided by the charity were truly life-changing.

meanings.definition: A plural form of "hep," meaning fashionable or stylish.
meanings.sent1: They wore their heps to the party and stood out.
meanings.sent2: The heps of the 60s are making a comeback in fashion.
meanings.sent3: His heps were so cool that everyone wanted to dress like him.
meanings.sent4: The heps of the celebrities set the trend for the season.
meanings.sent5: The heps of the models on the runway were eye-catching and unique.
